abstract: Amazon.com, which has been rapidly adding digital downloads to its vast Web store, will bolster those offerings with Audible, the largest online seller of audiobooks.
snippet: Amazon.com, which has been rapidly adding digital downloads to its vast Web store, will bolster those offerings with Audible, the largest online seller of audiobooks.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com, which has been rapidly adding digital downloads to its vast Web store, said on Thursday that it had agreed to buy Audible, the largest online seller of audiobooks.

headline.main: Amazon to Buy Audiobook Seller for $300 Million
headline.print_headline: Amazon Buying Audible, Online Audiobook Seller
